name: Kuumuus
description:
A game in Finnish about a hot day, in a world transformed by climate change. Translation is on its way - I will link it here once it's done!

If you want updates on other stuff I make, I have a Twitter account:

https://twitter.com/serafiron

If you liked the game, feel free to leave some money as well. All money will be used to make the next small game!

Day 1 patch: Fixed a typo and added credits, as well as a screenshot. Thank you, sharp-eyed player, for noticing what I missed!
